item.title: ESP Home
item.description: /c/ESP Home on libreauto.app https://libreauto.app/c/esphome Description [ESPHome](https://esphome.io/) is a system to control your ESP8266/ESP32 by simple yet powerful configuration files and control them remotely through Home Automation systems.
